snippet: Ms. Morgin uses unfired clay, crayons, ink, graphite and markers to create apparently weathered, used and abused surfaces.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews works by mixed-media artist Kristen Morgin at Zach Feuer gallery.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Morgin uses unfired clay, crayons, ink, graphite and markers to create apparently weathered, used and abused surfaces.

headline.print_headline: Kristen Morgin: ‘The Super Can Man and Other Illustrated Classics’
headline.main: Kristen Morgin: ‘The Super Can Man and Other Illustrated Classics’
